name: Focus your Locus
description:
Submission to Weekly Game Jam #53 Theme: One Hit

Focus your Locus is dodgeball with a twist.

An action game divided in levels where you have to tag your opponents.

Beware, the more balls you throw, the harder the game gets! 

Plan your shots with caution!

Authors:

Programming and Level Design  by jvolonte

Art by Bhagat

Main Theme by Gerry Brazell

SFX  from: ZapSplat
